title: Analysis of Global Food Expenditure and High Food Prices
text: GlobalFoodPrices R package designed analyze global food expenditure high food price trends. provides users tools explore food expenditure patterns across countries assess prevalence high food prices time. package includes functions calculating average food expenditure, identifying countries high food prices, analyzing expenditure growth. interactive Shiny app allows users visualize engage data.

title: Analysis of Global Food Expenditure and High Food Prices
text: Global Food Expenditure Data: Access comprehensive data food expenditure per person across various countries years. High Food Price Analysis: Examine proportion countries experiencing high food prices trends change time. Interactive Visualization: Utilize built-Shiny app explore data interactively, including options filter year country. Analytical Functions: Built-functions calculating average food expenditure, identifying countries high food prices, measuring expenditure growth years.

title: Analysis of Global Food Expenditure and High Food Prices
text: can use GlobalFoodPrices functions calculate average food expenditure explore trends high food prices across different countries.
code: # Example: Calculating Average Food Expenditure for a Specific Year library(GlobalFoodPrices) avg_expenditure <- calculate_yearly_avg_expenditure(cleaned_food_expenditure, year = 2020) print(avg_expenditure)  # Example: Identifying Countries with High Food Prices in a Given Year high_price_countries <- identify_high_price_countries(cleaned_high_food_prices, year = 2020, threshold = 50) print(high_price_countries)
